name: How to adjust time
info:
You can adjust time by assigning a number 1-5.
1 is the slowest and 5 is the fastest

name: Limit the amount of data sent to the display
info:
The Raspberry Pi constantly reads the sensors.

This is a good thing if you want to gragh something but can quickly become overweleming.

This limits it to only running evey minute.

name: Set the Msg to the Temp
info: This function grabs the temp from the object that is sent by the Raspberry Pi.

name: Blue and Black
ledMsg will display a msg on the local dispay
Press to test ledMsg
info: This will send 'Test ledMSG' to the local LED

name: ledMsg/Tables/# will display a msg a specific table's display
Copy this flow to each Raspberry Pi and replace the Table number
Press to test ledMsg/Tables/1
info: This will send 'Test ledMSG/Tables/1' to the local LED

name: This Flow requires MQTT running on a server at 10.0.10.100
Blue and Black
ledMsg/Tables will display a msg on all displays
Press to test ledMsg/Tables
info: This will send 'Test ledMSG/Tables' to the local LED
